attributes.action: Back pay the Police pay increase from the 1st September 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Back pay the agreed pay increase of 2.5% for Officers in England and Wales from the 1st September 2007 and not the 1st December 2007 as proposed by the Home Secretary. This falls in line with Police Officers located in Scotland. To agree to this and future pay increases.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
